name: Block Gal
overview: A hot chick is stuck and being obscured by a big array of blocks and you are tasked with freeing her up for the world to see! In the amazing Block Gal you must use the paddle at the bottom of the screen to blast up the ball high to the top of the levels, hitting blocks to destroy them and keep going until all the blocks are gone and the beautiful girl is plain for the world to see! Free the beauty from the confines of the blocks!
